attributes.action: Conservative Party must step down from power.
attributes.additional_details: Taxpayers money going on acts of war without hard evidence to justify it while saying there is no money for school meals, NHS, public services and welfare. It’s clear this government is not serving the people but serving themselves without a care for consequence. I strongly feel the whole party not just the PM need to ceasefire and step down.
